name: plex_media_server
description: Checks Plex Media Server status and restarts it if inactive. Uses sudo-safe systemctl for consistency.
check_cmd: if sudo systemctl is-active plexmediaserver >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo active; else echo inactive; fi
verify_cmd: if sudo systemctl is-active plexmediaserver >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo active; else echo inactive; fi
